msbt.message: Whoa! Is that a horned dynastid? They're like the king of the insects! Sodo I need to bow or something?
Turns out the two horn-looking things are its jaw. That's so wild!
Saw teeth would really come in handy if you were, like, building a house or something.
The shape of those horns is wild! I wish I could rock that look.
Mantises always look like they're prepping for a fight. It's OK, little fella. You can let your guard down!
Those wings made me think this was a butterfly. They're so gorgeous! But it turns out it's a moth!
Scarab beetles are soooo sparkly I can't stop staring.
This thing's such a vivid purple Oh! It's a great purple emperor. Yeah, that makes sense, then.
Is it just me, or do jewel beetles look kinda like sparkly, metal toys?
Check out the wings! I bet this butterfly's a hit with the other bugs.
This butterfly's beautiful! I'm totally overwhelmed by that blue.Can a butterfly rock? 'Cause I think this one rocks!
A firefly! These guys're like my little night-light buddies. We go way back.
Atlas moths are so huge!Hey, is it just me or do the wingtips look like a snake's face? Super creepy
I don't think I've ever seen a bigger butterfly. Oh! It actually IS the biggest butterfly! OK, then!
That scorpion stinger really draws the eye, doesn't it? Yikes!
Wasps make me SO nervous. As long as it doesn't go anywhere near me, I'll be fineprobably
That firefly's kinda dragging. It's not sparkling or moving or anything!Do they drink coffee?
That man-faced stink bug kinda looks like my uncle I can't decide if that's good or bad.
Oh! I thought that was just a leaf, but it's actually a bug. Totally had me fooled, !
Bell cricket songs remind me of quiet evenings in the country Love that sound, .
A cicada shell? Cool! But where'd the cicada go, ?
This rosalia batesi beetle's showin' some major style. Check out those colors, !
The damselfly's so thin! You gotta have guts to go up against the other bugs if you're built like that!
A mosquito, eh? Well, as long as it doesn't get loose, I guess that's kinda cool.
Hey, , that bug was your donation, right? It's quite a catch. You rock, !
It's vs ! Who's gonna win?
